nodes.excerpt: Tally is a new type of form builder. Just start typing and build forms for all purposes in seconds. Without knowing how to code, and for free!

localize.description: Tally是一种新型的表单构建器。只需开始输入并在几秒钟内建立各种用途的表单。不需要知道如何编写代码，而且是免费的。

nodes.excerpt: Litmaps lets you navigate the scientific literature with interactive visualisations of citation networks. Create a literature map, discover new articles, and export your discoveries, to advance your research project.

localize.tagline: 用交互式引文地图搜索科学文献

localize.description: Litmaps讓你通過交互式可視化的引用網絡來瀏覽科學文獻。創建一個文獻地圖，發現新的文章，並導出你的發現，以推進你的研究項目。
localize.tagline: 用交互式引文地圖搜索科學文獻

nodes.excerpt: OneSimpleApi was born out of the idea that there should be a simple way of achieving complex features, when working with no-code tools. A toolbox, where you can find all the APIs that will make your creation go the extra mile: Just... One Simple API.
nodes.title: OneSimpleApi.com - The first API toolkit for no-coders
nodes.author: Pablius

localize.description: OneSimpleApi诞生于这样一个理念：在使用无代码工具时，应该有一种简单的方式来实现复杂的功能。一个工具箱，在这里你可以找到所有的API，这将使你的创作更上一层楼。只要... 一个简单的API。
localize.tagline: 首个面向无码者的API工具包

localize.description: OneSimpleApi誕生於這樣一個理念：在使用無代碼工具時，應該有一種簡單的方式來實現複雜的功能。一個工具箱，在這裏你可以找到所有的API，這將使你的創作更上一層樓。只要... 一個簡單的API。
localize.tagline: 首個面向無碼者的API工具包

nodes.excerpt: Creating a nice looking SVG Color Matrix filter is tricky. This free web-app helps you easily create the right color matrix for your picture. Add contrast, brightness, hue, and saturation filters or adjust one or multiple matrix values simultaneously.
nodes.title: SVG Color Matrix Mixer - Generate nice looking color matrix filters for your images
nodes.author: Rik Schennink

localize.description: 创建一个好看的SVG颜色矩阵滤镜是很棘手的。这个免费的网络应用可以帮助你轻松地为你的图片创建正确的颜色矩阵。添加对比度、亮度、色调和饱和度滤镜或同时调整一个或多个矩阵值。
localize.tagline: 为您的图像生成漂亮的彩色矩阵滤镜。

localize.description: 創建一個好看的SVG顏色矩陣濾鏡是很棘手的。這個免費的網絡應用可以幫助你輕鬆地爲你的圖片創建正確的顏色矩陣。添加對比度、亮度、色調和飽和度濾鏡或同時調整一個或多個矩陣值。
localize.tagline: 爲您的圖像生成漂亮的彩色矩陣濾鏡。

nodes.excerpt: A web app that uses spaced repetition, a sophisticated learning algorithm, and a tree-structured note-taking tool. Think Workflowy and Anki combined. It also brings together various learning theories and tricks.

nodes.excerpt: Our online eye exam makes it easy to get eye care from your couch. Visit our online eye clinic to quickly renew your glasses +/- contact lens prescriptions ($30,) or chat with a licensed eye doctor ($55)! Try here: https://www.quadranteye.com/ YC W21 Batch

nodes.excerpt: Avo takes the busywork out of analytics with a guided workflow that catches errors and syncs across your existing tools (including Amplitude and Mixpanel). For people who are tired of spending more time managing their data than building great products.
nodes.title: Avo for PMs - Error proof your analytics
nodes.author: Stefania Olafsdottir

localize.description: Avo通过一个指导性的工作流程，捕捉错误并在现有的工具（包括Amplitude和Mixpanel）之间同步，将繁忙的工作从分析中解放出来。对于那些厌倦了花更多的时间来管理数据而不是建立伟大的产品的人来说。
localize.tagline: 防止您的分析错误

localize.description: Avo通過一個指導性的工作流程，捕捉錯誤並在現有的工具（包括Amplitude和Mixpanel）之間同步，將繁忙的工作從分析中解放出來。對於那些厭倦了花更多的時間來管理數據而不是建立偉大的產品的人來說。
localize.tagline: 防止您的分析錯誤

nodes.excerpt: With this new Zapier plugin, Bubble apps can create both “triggers” or “actions” for a Zap. This lets you do everything from trigger workflows to add, delete, and modify things in your Bubble app database with any web service in Zapier’s extensive library.
nodes.title: Official Bubble Zapier Integration - Connect any web service to a no-code web app.
nodes.author: Vivienne Chen

localize.description: 通过这个新的Zapier插件，Bubble应用程序可以为Zap创建 "触发器 "或 "动作"。这让你可以通过Zapier广泛的库中的任何网络服务，在你的Bubble应用数据库中完成从触发工作流到添加、删除和修改事物的一切工作。
localize.tagline: 将任何网络服务连接到一个无代码的网络应用。

localize.description: 通過這個新的Zapier插件，Bubble應用程序可以爲Zap創建 "觸發器 "或 "動作"。這讓你可以通過Zapier廣泛的庫中的任何網絡服務，在你的Bubble應用數據庫中完成從觸發工作流到添加、刪除和修改事物的一切工作。
localize.tagline: 將任何網絡服務連接到一個無代碼的網絡應用。

nodes.excerpt: tw-rl is an advanced bookmarking and curation tool for twitter. Once connected, easily showcase tweet media or "loop" threads together. Use cases: portfolio, blog, mood board, inspiration gallery.

nodes.excerpt: Enombic is a product for designing your own custom stock indexes, investing in them, and sharing them with your friends. Remix the ARK ETFs, market-cap weight the WSB symbols, or "fork" SPY and set your own custom weights. Then, it's one click to invest!
nodes.title: Enombic - Create your own stock indexes
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: Enombic是一款用于设计自己的自定义股指，投资股指，并与朋友分享的产品。重新组合ARK ETF，市值加权WSB符号，或 "分叉 "SPY并设置您自己的自定义权重。然后，就可以一键投资了!
localize.tagline: 创建自己的股票指数

localize.description: Enombic是一款用於設計自己的自定義股指，投資股指，並與朋友分享的產品。重新組合ARK ETF，市值加權WSB符號，或 "分叉 "SPY並設置您自己的自定義權重。然後，就可以一鍵投資了!
localize.tagline: 創建自己的股票指數

nodes.excerpt: Say goodbye to alt-tabbing for scattered resources and "productivity" tools TODAY. Typed⏎ is your one-and-only document workspace that streamlines research, drafting, communication and knowledge management. If Google Drives you crazy, get Typed⏎ now.
nodes.title: Typed⏎ Beta - Google Docs on Steroids
nodes.author: Trevor Owens

localize.description: 告别alt-tabbing分散的资源和 "生产力 "工具，今天。Typed⏎是您唯一的文档工作区，可简化研究、起草、沟通和知识管理。如果谷歌让你抓狂，现在就去买Typed⏎。
localize.tagline: Google Docs on Steroids

localize.description: 告別alt-tabbing分散的資源和 "生產力 "工具，今天。Typed⏎是您唯一的文檔工作區，可簡化研究、起草、溝通和知識管理。如果谷歌讓你抓狂，現在就去買Typed⏎。
localize.tagline: Google Docs on Steroids

nodes.excerpt: Need compliance solutions, but don’t want to spend thousands in legal fees? Termly’s compliance suite can help you stay up to date and compliant with privacy laws like the GDPR, CCPA, ePrivacy Regulation, and more — for FREE.
nodes.title: Termly.io - GDPR Compliance Solution for Small Business
nodes.author: Nolan Clemmons

localize.description: 需要合规性解决方案，但又不想花费成千上万的法律费用？Termly的合规性套件可以帮助您保持最新状态，并遵守隐私法，如GDPR、CCPA、电子隐私条例等--免费。
localize.tagline: 小企业GDPR合规解决方案

localize.description: 需要合規性解決方案，但又不想花費成千上萬的法律費用？Termly的合規性套件可以幫助您保持最新狀態，並遵守隱私法，如GDPR、CCPA、電子隱私條例等--免費。
localize.tagline: 小企業GDPR合規解決方案
